attributes.additional_details:
Wind farms should be banned and dismantled.

We still need conventional energy generation as it is not always windy and hence wind farms are not reliable.

The construction of wind farms is therefore a needless expense, use of energy, use of raw materials, blight on the coutryside and a coastal hazard. Finally they are an import that we do not need.

Nuclear power is the only sensible source for our baseload requirements.
